From Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia




2020 Indian filmThe Hundred BucksDirected byDushyant Pratap SinghWritten byVishnupriya SinghScreenplay byM SalimBased onA bookStarringKavita TripathiDinesh BawraRelease date
21 February 2020 (2020-02-21)
[1]CountryIndiaLanguageHindi
The Hundred Bucks (Hindi:द हंड्रेड बक्स)[2] is a 2020 Indian film directed by Dushyant Pratap Singh. The film stars Kavita Tripathi and Dinesh Bawra in lead. The film is distributed by Manoj Nandwana. The film is written by Vishnupriya Singh.
The screenplay of the above movie is written by M. Salim, an Indian writer known for penning down the screenplay of Dongri Ka Raja. Directed by Hadi Ali Abrar, the movie stars Ronit Roy, Gashmeer Mahajani, and Reecha Sinha in lead roles.


Plot[edit]
The hundred Bucks tells the story of one night of a call girl. How she finds her customers and how she got cheated.[3]

Cast[edit]
Alya bhati[4]
Danish taimoor
Javed Shaikh
Amar Mehta[5]
References[edit]
The Times of India gave the film 1.5 out of 5 stars.[6] Another negative review can be found at FilmInformation.[7] The film was declared a commercial disaster by Box Office India.[8]
